title: Ultimate Prawn Soup
ingredients: ['2 litres chicken stock', '2 tablespoons rosemary', '5 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon celery seeds', '1/2 teaspoon fennel seeds', '250ml clam juice or fish stock', '85g tomato puree', '225g butter', '250ml white wine', '900g prawns with tails', '450g baguette']
